verbs.description: [ARG1: italian pride] [V: flies] [ARGM-MNR: high] [ARGM-ADV: for greenwich couple] [ARGM-TMP: for more than 30 years] the st lawrence society has honored one prominent citizen of italian descent who then helps to raise the flags outside greenwich town hall on columbus day but some traditions are meant to be changed for the first time the st lawrence society on monday honored two greenwich residents john and sharon vecchiolla who shared the honor of raising both the italian and american flags she is a former town registrar of voters and he is a current member of the town planning and zoning board of appeals and a past member of the board of education both have volunteered in the town for decades it an extremely nice honor attorney st lawrence society fred camillo renato berzolla john vecchiolla board of education julian curtiss school kate italy greenwich michelle vecchiolla salomon rep jim himes sharon vecchiolla tod laudonia carmella budkins reps livvy floren calabria u s town hall democratic registrar president fred decaro iii michelle st lawrence society greenwich town hall peter tesei zoning board of appeals
